vgp.discrete.harmonic

Class PgHarmonicMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • jv.object.PsObject
      • jv.project.PgGeometry
        • vgp.discrete.harmonic.PgSurfacePair
          • vgp.discrete.harmonic.PgHarmonicMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, PsTimeListenerIf, PsUpdateIf, PgGeometryIf

    public class PgHarmonicMap
extends PgSurfacePair
    Discrete harmonic maps between surfaces are given by specifying a domain and an image surface. Additionally, image surface may have a conjugate surface and a continuous, animatable 1-parameter family between surface and its conjugate.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
